name: Sahota Ice Fields
description: A cavern of ice extends in all directions for miles. Magical ice monsters roam the open plain, while the walls appear to be harvestable. Here and there it appears you may be able to enter the walls through caves, but they are blocked off with thick, hardy roots.

unlockableAreas.buttonText: Continue along the main cave path

name: Sahota Caverns
description: The caverns all seem to converge into one large tunnel. The path ahead is frozen solid. But beneath the ice you can hear flowing water.

name: Sahota Clearing
description: The tunnel opens up into a bright clearing. A mysterious orb lights the whole area, making it almost indistinguishable from being out on the surface. You spot a small camp a little ways ahead. The far end of the opening leads to another dark area of the underworld.

buildings.name: Hunting Camp
buildings.description: The camp is home a few tents, all surrounding a large fire. Men with long spears are sitting around it. They seem to be planning something.

name: Sahota Dungeon
description: The path leads into an ancient fortress. It seems to span for miles, and is full of the same mercurial creatures that also guard the surface of Mt. Yama cave.

name: Sahota Castle
description: You happen upon a part of the dungeon made entirely from ice. The castle here is filled with mercurial creatures.
